name: misty-surge
effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to misty terrain.
short_effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Misty Terrain.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
